com.bg.check.database
类 DatabaseHandler

java.lang.Object
  com.bg.check.database.DatabaseHandler

public final class DatabaseHandler
extends java.lang.Object

Wrap class to access DB, which has a function to notify UI. UI register database Observer by addDatabaseObserver and remove observer by removeDatabaseObserver

嵌套类摘要
